MyList.title: Which app gives quick loan?
paragraph: 1- Credy is one of the quick loan giving apps in India that provides personal loans on personalised terms. With no hidden costs, no requirement of collateral or a guarantor, fast online processing, and acceptance of a low CIBIL score, Credy is simple, fast and low-cost.

MyList.title: What is the Paybill number for Senti loan?
paragraph: 2- Input your phone number as the account number. Enter loan amount. Input your M-Pesa PIN. Confirm the details are correct and press OK.

MyList.title: How can I get Shika loan?
paragraph: 1- SHIKA is a Kenyan based app that enables you get a loan sent straight to your M-PESA whenever you need it in less than 180 SECONDS! Once you download the app, verify your phone number, register with us, choose a PIN, request for your loan and receive it via your M-PESA within a matter of seconds!

MyList.title: What is senti app?
paragraph: 1- Senti is a micro credit mobile app that makes it easy for people in Kenya to access a loan, anytime, anywhere.

MyList.title: How do you pay a monthly loan?
paragraph: 1- If your rate is 5.5%, divide 0.055 by 12 to calculate your monthly interest rate. ...
2- Calculate the repayment term in months. ...
3- Calculate the interest over the life of the loan. ...
4- Divide the loan amount by the interest over the life of the loan to calculate your monthly payment.

MyList.title: Can I pay loan amount online?
paragraph: 1- You don't have to write cheques, visit a branch or wait in a queue for your turn to make payments. Simply follow few steps and there you are stress-free of your monthly EMI payments. It's fast, uncomplicated and secure, you can repay loan online as per your convenience.
